scripts.compile-pcss: postcss src/index.pcss --use postcss-import postcss-nesting autoprefixer -o public/css/app.css
scripts.watch-pcss: postcss src/index.pcss --watch --use postcss-import postcss-nesting autoprefixer -o public/css/app.css
scripts.build-ts: browserify src/index.ts -p [ tsify --project src/tsconfig.json ] | uglifyjs -cm -o public/js/app.js
scripts.build-pcss: postcss src/index.pcss --no-map --use postcss-import postcss-nesting autoprefixer postcss-clean -o public/css/app.css
scripts.serve: budo src/index.ts:js/app.js -p 3000 --dir public --live=*.{html,css} -- --debug -p [ browserify-hmr ] -p [ tsify --project src/tsconfig.json ]
